data.title: Internships & Job Search
data.meta_description: Internships & Job Search College of Communication & Information | h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, a { font-family: sans-serif; } .position-container h3 { font-weight: 600; font-size: 0.8em; text-transform: uppercase; } .position-buttons { padding: 1em 0; display: flex; gap: 0.5em; flex-wrap: wrap; } .job-button { text-decoration: none; padding: 10px 20px; border: solid 1px #898989; border-radius: 100px; color: black; cursor: pointer; } .j
data.text:
Whether you're:

looking for the perfect internship your major requires or

wanting to network in your chosen field or

an alum or senior seeking employment opportunities,

we've partnered with a wide variety of employers who are looking for talented people like you.
